mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTS(PRODUCTNUM, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTDETAIL, PRODUCTRATE, PRODUCTDATE) VALUES (PRODUCTNUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{productName},#{productDetail},#{productRate},#{productDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCTS SET PRODUCTNAME = #{productName},PRODUCTDETAIL = #{productDetail}, PRODUCTRATE=#{productRate}, PRODUCTDATE =#{productDate} WHERE PRODUCTNUM= #{productNum}
